column4: so it's not dd's fault. check if the device is available in fdisk -l
For future reference it's 1.10.0. I had to use ALSA output instead as the repos don't have that yet for Maverick. [VLC issue]
It's pretty bad, if VLC is left open long enough and not killed in time it will cause a system hang from memory leak :O. Damn pulse audio.
